industries.name: Agriculture, Forestry, Fishing and Hunting
industries.description: Industries involved in growing crops, raising animals, harvesting timber, and harvesting fish and other animals from farms, ranches, or natural habitats.

subIndustries.name: Crop Production
subIndustries.description: Growing and harvesting crops including grains, vegetables, fruits, and tree nuts.

subIndustries.name: Animal Production and Aquaculture
subIndustries.description: Raising and fattening animals, and aquaculture for food, fiber, and other products.

subIndustries.name: Forestry and Logging
subIndustries.description: Growing and harvesting timber on a long production cycle.

subIndustries.name: Fishing, Hunting and Trapping
subIndustries.description: Harvesting fish and other wild animals from their natural habitats.

industries.name: Mining, Quarrying, and Oil and Gas Extraction
industries.description: Extracting naturally occurring mineral solids, liquid minerals, and gases from the earth.

subIndustries.name: Oil and Gas Extraction
subIndustries.description: Operating and developing oil and gas field properties, including exploration.

subIndustries.name: Mining (except Oil and Gas)
subIndustries.description: Mining, beneficiating, and preparing metallic and nonmetallic minerals.

subIndustries.name: Support Activities for Mining
subIndustries.description: Performing support activities on a contract or fee basis for the mining sector.

industries.name: Construction
industries.description: Building and engineering projects including residential, commercial, industrial construction and infrastructure.

subIndustries.name: Construction of Buildings
subIndustries.description: Construction of residential and nonresidential buildings.

subIndustries.name: Heavy and Civil Engineering Construction
subIndustries.description: Construction of highways, streets, bridges, tunnels, and utility systems.

subIndustries.name: Specialty Trade Contractors
subIndustries.description: Specialized construction activities such as plumbing, electrical, and masonry.

industries.name: Manufacturing
industries.description: Mechanical, physical, or chemical transformation of materials into new products.

subIndustries.name: Food Manufacturing
subIndustries.description: Transforming livestock and agricultural products into products for intermediate or final consumption.

subIndustries.name: Beverage and Tobacco Product Manufacturing
subIndustries.description: Manufacturing beverages and tobacco products.

subIndustries.name: Textile Mills
subIndustries.description: Transforming fibers into yarn, thread, or fabric.

subIndustries.name: Apparel Manufacturing
subIndustries.description: Manufacturing of apparel and accessories from fabrics and materials.

subIndustries.name: Chemical Manufacturing
subIndustries.description: Transforming organic and inorganic raw materials by a chemical process.

subIndustries.name: Pharmaceutical and Medicine Manufacturing
subIndustries.description: Manufacturing pharmaceutical and medicine products.

subIndustries.name: Computer and Electronic Product Manufacturing
subIndustries.description: Manufacturing computers, computer peripherals, and electronic components.

subIndustries.name: Transportation Equipment Manufacturing
subIndustries.description: Manufacturing equipment for transporting people and goods.

industries.name: Wholesale Trade
industries.description: Selling merchandise to retailers, industrial, commercial, or institutional users.

subIndustries.name: Merchant Wholesalers, Durable Goods
subIndustries.description: Wholesaling durable goods such as motor vehicles, furniture, and machinery.

subIndustries.name: Merchant Wholesalers, Nondurable Goods
subIndustries.description: Wholesaling nondurable goods such as paper, chemicals, and grocery items.

industries.name: Retail Trade
industries.description: Selling merchandise generally without transformation to the general public.

subIndustries.name: Motor Vehicle and Parts Dealers
subIndustries.description: Retailing new and used motor vehicles and parts.

subIndustries.name: Food and Beverage Stores
subIndustries.description: Retailing food and beverages from fixed locations.

subIndustries.name: General Merchandise Stores
subIndustries.description: Retailing new goods in department stores and other general merchandise retailers.

subIndustries.name: Electronic Shopping and Mail-Order Houses
subIndustries.description: Retailing merchandise through electronic media or mail-order catalogs.

industries.name: Transportation and Warehousing
industries.description: Transporting passengers and cargo, warehousing and storage, and related support activities.

subIndustries.name: Air Transportation
subIndustries.description: Providing air transportation of passengers and cargo.

subIndustries.name: Rail Transportation
subIndustries.description: Providing rail transportation of passengers and cargo.

subIndustries.name: Truck Transportation
subIndustries.description: Providing over-the-road transportation of cargo.

subIndustries.name: Warehousing and Storage
subIndustries.description: Operating warehousing and storage facilities.

industries.name: Information
industries.description: Producing and distributing information and cultural products, and providing data processing.

subIndustries.name: Publishing Industries
subIndustries.description: Publishing newspapers, periodicals, books, and software.

subIndustries.name: Motion Picture and Sound Recording Industries
subIndustries.description: Producing and distributing motion pictures and sound recordings.

subIndustries.name: Broadcasting (except Internet)
subIndustries.description: Creating content or acquiring broadcasting rights and generating revenues.

subIndustries.name: Telecommunications
subIndustries.description: Operating and providing access to telecommunications infrastructure.

subIndustries.name: Data Processing, Hosting, and Related Services
subIndustries.description: Providing infrastructure for hosting and data processing services.

industries.name: Finance and Insurance
industries.description: Financial transactions and facilitating financial transactions, including insurance and related activities.

subIndustries.name: Credit Intermediation and Related Activities
subIndustries.description: Lending funds raised from depositors and other sources.

subIndustries.name: Securities, Commodity Contracts, and Investments
subIndustries.description: Underwriting, making markets, and dealing in securities.

subIndustries.name: Insurance Carriers and Related Activities
subIndustries.description: Underwriting annuities and insurance policies.

subIndustries.name: Funds, Trusts, and Other Financial Vehicles
subIndustries.description: Pooling securities or other assets on behalf of shareholders.

industries.name: Real Estate and Rental and Leasing
industries.description: Renting, leasing, or allowing use of tangible or intangible assets.

subIndustries.name: Real Estate
subIndustries.description: Renting or leasing real estate, managing real estate, and related services.

subIndustries.name: Rental and Leasing Services
subIndustries.description: Renting or leasing tangible goods such as automobiles and equipment.

industries.name: Professional, Scientific, and Technical Services
industries.description: Performing professional, scientific, and technical activities for others.

subIndustries.name: Legal Services
subIndustries.description: Providing legal advice, representation, and related services.

subIndustries.name: Accounting, Tax Preparation, and Payroll Services
subIndustries.description: Providing accounting, tax preparation, bookkeeping, and payroll services.

subIndustries.name: Architectural, Engineering, and Related Services
subIndustries.description: Providing architectural, engineering, and specialized design services.

subIndustries.name: Computer Systems Design and Related Services
subIndustries.description: Planning and designing computer systems, providing software development.

subIndustries.name: Management, Scientific, and Technical Consulting Services
subIndustries.description: Providing advice and assistance on management and technical issues.

subIndustries.name: Advertising, Public Relations, and Related Services
subIndustries.description: Creating advertising campaigns and public relations activities.

industries.name: Health Care and Social Assistance
industries.description: Providing health care and social assistance for individuals.

subIndustries.name: Ambulatory Health Care Services
subIndustries.description: Providing health care services directly to outpatients.

subIndustries.name: Hospitals
subIndustries.description: Providing medical, diagnostic, and treatment services to inpatients.

subIndustries.name: Nursing and Residential Care Facilities
subIndustries.description: Providing residential care combined with nursing or other health care.

subIndustries.name: Social Assistance
subIndustries.description: Providing social assistance services to individuals and families.

industries.name: Arts, Entertainment, and Recreation
industries.description: Operating facilities or providing services to meet cultural, entertainment, and recreational interests.

subIndustries.name: Performing Arts, Spectator Sports, and Related Industries
subIndustries.description: Producing or organizing live performances, events, and sports.

subIndustries.name: Museums, Historical Sites, and Similar Institutions
subIndustries.description: Preserving and exhibiting objects, sites, and natural wonders.

subIndustries.name: Amusement, Gambling, and Recreation Industries
subIndustries.description: Operating facilities for amusement, gambling, and recreation activities.

industries.name: Accommodation and Food Services
industries.description: Providing lodging and preparing meals, snacks, and beverages for immediate consumption.

subIndustries.name: Accommodation
subIndustries.description: Providing short-term lodging in hotels, motels, and other facilities.

subIndustries.name: Food Services and Drinking Places
subIndustries.description: Preparing meals, snacks, and beverages for immediate consumption.

industries.name: Educational Services
industries.description: Providing instruction and training in a wide variety of subjects.

subIndustries.name: Elementary and Secondary Schools
subIndustries.description: Providing academic instruction at the elementary and secondary level.

subIndustries.name: Colleges, Universities, and Professional Schools
subIndustries.description: Providing academic instruction at the post-secondary level.

subIndustries.name: Technical and Trade Schools
subIndustries.description: Providing vocational and technical training.

subIndustries.name: Educational Support Services
subIndustries.description: Providing non-instructional services that support educational processes.

industries.name: Public Administration
industries.description: Administering, overseeing, and managing public programs.

subIndustries.name: Executive, Legislative, and General Government
subIndustries.description: Executive and legislative functions of government.

subIndustries.name: Justice, Public Order, and Safety Activities
subIndustries.description: Maintaining justice, public order, and safety.

subIndustries.name: Administration of Human Resource Programs
subIndustries.description: Administering programs for education, health, and social services.

subIndustries.name: National Security and International Affairs
subIndustries.description: Managing national security and international affairs.

industries.name: Utilities
industries.description: Providing electric power, natural gas, steam, water, and sewage removal.

subIndustries.name: Electric Power Generation, Transmission and Distribution
subIndustries.description: Generating, transmitting, and distributing electric power.

subIndustries.name: Natural Gas Distribution
subIndustries.description: Distributing natural gas to consumers.

subIndustries.name: Water, Sewage, and Other Systems
subIndustries.description: Operating water treatment plants and sewage systems.
